anyone wondering why that city was deserted. the city is located on a road coming from algeria. paralel to that road there is another road coming from morocco. the last 20 years morocco boosted his economy and his exports of food and materials and foreign investestors started moving to morocco. the Mauritanian realized that buying from morocco is cheaper and easier and higher quality. now that road is abandoned and the city died.
last month algeria sent some mercenaries to cut that road and stop the flow of traffic on that road (portion of the road about 15 km is demilliterized by the UN and it's a no man's land) because its killing algeria's economy. but the moroccan millitary reacted and freed that road.

PARTICLE PHYSICS IN HOLY QUR'AN

The word " ذرة " used in this verse
means itom. Smaller than itom indicate that there are particles smaller than itom. Itom contains electron and proton and.These particles are smaller than itom.

و قال الذين كفروا لاتأتينا الساعة ، قل بلى وربى لتاتينكم علم الغيب لا يعزب عنه مثقال ذرة في السموات ولا في الأرض و لا اصغر من ذلك ولا أكبر إلا في كتب مبين o
( سبأ : ٣)
Those who disbelieve say: The Hour will never come unto us. Say: Nay, by my Lord, but it is coming unto you surely. (He is) the knower of the Unseen. Not an itom's weight, or less than that or greater, escapeth Him in the heavens or in the earth, but it is in a clear Record".
(Qur'an.Saba:3)

Modern science knew this fact in 20th century. Who can say 1450 years ago that there are particles smaller than itom?
Only Almighty Allah Who created these particles.
Higs Boson particle is also created by Allah. It is not God.

If yon see meaning of ذرة in Arabic dictionary you will come to know that this word means itom. It is written in all English-Arabic dictionaries.

We all know that they are originated from the Arabian Peninsula and roamed around the Sahara which streches from the Red Sea in Sudan until the coasts of Mauritania. All the people who live within The Sahara are sahraouis (desert dwellers), not only you.
On the other hand, my people, the Amazigh, are the indigenous inhabitants to the whole territory. We named places and villages in Berber that you, the invaders, can’t even recognize their meanings such as Tifariti and Imlili.
